t: Buy Patriot Tires on Sale: New or Used | United Tires
s: Patriot Tires are a specialist brand of tires, produced by the highly successful Singapore-based international tire distributor, Omni. Launched in 2016, Patriot Tires is a military-inspired range of tires, designed specifically for SUVs, light trucks, and passenger cars.

t: Patriot® A/T | Omni United
s: Omni United is a Singapore based tire designer, manufacturer and distributor. Founded by GS Sareen in 2003 it owns the Radar brand and distributes many others.
